did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.physdesc: This is 1 volume in this collection (21 cm).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Prosser Family Library Catalog, 1879-1908, Accession #11075, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This volume was given to the Library by Clifton Waller Barrett via a transfer from the Rare Books Division of the University of Virginia Library on January 4, 1993.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a single bound volume, 1879-1908, "Catalogue of Books in the Library of Thomas Prosser and A. Louise Prosser," of Brooklyn, New York, recording their book purchases, with title, author, publisher, and physical description of each book.
